name: Dangel
description:
The game is about an Angel and a Demon.

The map is divided into 2 different areas: Heaven and Hell, by a wide river. The players should fight each others. Aim using the mouse and hold left click in order to charge the shot, releasing in order to fire.

Every 3 trees destroyed by the Demon character, or restored by the angel character, the respective player will be able to use his ultimate ability by pressing the 'R' key on the keyboard. A counter for each player displaying the number of trees destroyed is available above the health icon.

The first player to deplete his HP will loose. Enjoy!
